text: Laraine Day (or La Raine Johnson, October 13, 1920 â€“ November 10, 2007) was an American actress. She played Miss Carol Banning in the movie Painted Desert. She played Mary Lamont in Calling Dr. Kildare. Day was born in Roosevelt, Utah. She died in Ivins, Utah from natural causes at age 87. == Other websites == * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Utah Category:1920 births
title: Laraine Day
